name: Mild Turkey
text:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die. Until the end of this turn, reduce this card's Pendulum Scale by that number (min. 1).

[ Monster Effect ] 
''The taste of victory will bowl you over.''
pendulum_text: Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die. Until the end of this turn, reduce this card's Pendulum Scale by that number (min. 1).
